english_requirement_detail: Proficiency in the Japanese language is not mandatory. English business level required.
regional_scholarship_info: Fully Funded Fellowship. Monthly Salary: JPY 220,000.
description: The AYF Fellowship Program in Japan 2026 is an incredible opportunity for personal and professional growth on the captivating island of Awaji. It offers a monthly salary of JPY 220,000, free accommodation, and meals.
